Posts.Content: Angela from the oregon coast. age 44 white female. in may of 2011 I was stage 2 hers 2, invasive, 3 nodes taken out. mastocomy, chemo, dec.2011 radiation in corvallis oregon. May 2012 resconstruction with back strap muscle taken to rebuild the damage from radiation, inflattors inserted to strech skin all summer long then Sept. 2012 implants were put in. took tamoxifen 20 mil. everyday now in January 2013 was just told it went to stage 4 it masistic to my spine and liver. and I am looking to go to Cancer of America in Pheniox Arizona this next week. Does anyone out there have any experiences with Cancer of America? I would like the feed back. Please
Posts.Title: ROLL CALL name, age, state and any other info to share
